title: FreedomHouse2020報告已出！香港無大台抗爭創舉成果史上首次登上頭版！

replies.msg:
Freedom House 係乜Ｑ？
1941年成立，係世界最權威研究民主自由既非官方組織。

讚揚進行國際戰線既手足，成功利用現代科技社交媒體力量對抗中國國家文宣網絡機器！
HongKong’s prodemocracy protesters on Facebook and Twitter,
and the manipulation of content-ranking systems on Google,
Reddit, and YouTube. And the Chinese government is gaining
influence over crucial parts of other countries’ information
infrastructure through companies that manage digital television broadcasting and communications on mobile devices.

亦提及就算政府收回送中方案亦無阻香港人追求自由。
提及區選大勝，但其實失去的自由比得到的多。
The dramatic protests in Hong Kong erupted in response to
a proposed extradition bill that underscored the erosion of
civil liberties in the territory under Chinese rule. Even when
the bill was eventually withdrawn, the public continued to
press for other key demands, including universal suffrage. But
Beijing has refused to yield any more ground, and despite a
sweeping opposition victory in neighborhood-level elections
in November, Hong Kong has suffered more repression to
date than it has gained in freedom.

就算面對中國政府放任香港警察暴力鎖壓亦無令到香港人退讓，更繼續在區選表達絕不投降。
Beijing were met with police violence, but undeterred
voters expressed overwhelming support for prodemocracy
candidates in local elections.

閱讀
https://freedomhouse.org/sites/default/files/2020-02/FIW_2020_REPORT_BOOKLET_Final.pdf

繼續落去，記住全世界睇緊我地
為左入獄骨折強姦走難付出既人
永遠唔好唔記得有幾多個訴求
唔好唔記得有Ｄ野比吃喝玩樂重要
要記住每個人都可以係改變香港既力量

replies.msg:
全部都係由勇武同各個後援
無數至死付出
向世界響徹一聲
Fight for freedom
一聲之後呢？
會唔會忍住就此停步？
黑警係我地仇人
香港人
推 手足 不會忘記大家付出
